description:
Easy TODO Pro

This is the most complete CHECKLIST application available for your device. WE compiled  a list of the best features out there and mixed them into one application.


Main Features

✓ Add unlimited tasks.
✓ Add unlimited notes
✓ Easy and fast interface
✓ Create unlimited categories/folders
✓ Add Hotlist mark all applicable tasks
✓ You can "star" any specific task
✓ Easy to scroll notebook
✓ TODO export
✓ Sort tasks all together or separate (based on elected category)
✓ Portrait and landscape orientations are supported
✓ Repeat tasks (Never/Daily/Weekly/Monthly/Yearly)
✓ And much more.

★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★
If you need assistance please contact us info@gp-imports.com
★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★
We will be adding additional apps soon!
★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★
